text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Fair market value" means the value established by a contract or by the Department for a loss of grain at the time of the loss.

section.section: "Grain dealer" means a person who is in the business of buying, receiving, exchanging, or storing grain from a person who grows grain.
"Grain dealer" does not mean a farmer who buys, receives, exchanges, or stores grain for use in the farming business of that farmer.
